transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello
Executive: Namaste India mart Priya manager pesuren mam
Customer: pesurengala
Hello
Executive: ungaloda per enna
Customer: mam actually neenga oru feedback kuduthurukinga priyavoda communication related ah athu pathina feedback call panniruken
Executive: ungaloda per ennama
Customer: mam ennoda name Priya Ramkumar ungaloda manager pesura Priya Jay Priya Jay ok ok just two minutes before appo aama mam actually na ungaluku whatsapplayum na ungaluku athe idhlayum na ungaluku anupchiruken namaloda idhula vanthutu neenga oru reply kuduthurukinga mam satisfied with Priya Jay discussion illa apdinnu solli kuduthurukinga illa illa na unna kelvi kekkuren ippothan na oru package eduthuruken india martla illaiya ippo evlo naal aachu 15 days aayiduchuda 20 days than aama mam oru lead eduthutana innum oru close up kooda pannala na business edukkala it was in zero ok va ok appadi irukkumbothu ava eppadi adutha yearku three years package kepava athuketha mari ava solution package vikra mari pesunama customerku business eppadi pannunnu ungaluku lead eppadi neenga thedanum appadi solli kodukkanuma sollunga mam na solrathu puriyutha puriyuthu mam but mam unga ungaluku kathula poo vechutaru na vanthu kathula poo vechirukena panam katta katta currency ready pannittu india martku kodukrathuku na enna idha ungaluku sollunga mam avanga edho ungalukitta thappa pesunangala
Customer: amma phone wait first thavillama pesathu
Executive: mam avanga ungalukitta samla than pesirukanga andha mari edhu ungalukitta pesunangalanu kekkuren ippo na solrathu ungaluku puriyalaya tamil puriyalaya can you come to the english ok why you people are not understanding illa mam actually na adhu edhu ungaluku wronga irunthathu athula ungaluku idha irunthathula appadi mari avanga kitta discuss pannathu na kekkuren na aama eppadi ava appadi pesuva ippothan lead eduthu oru packagekulla vanthurukom athukulla i have shared with praveen total voice record you catch first time namma vachirukom mam idhu vanthu ungaluku suggestiona sonangala neenga idha panni aaganumnu edhu ungalukitta idhu pannangalanu kekkuren mam panni aaganumnu illa appadi illa ava eppadi suggestion kodukkala sollunga neenga vanthu business ippothan panni consulting irukom mam neenga pesurathu kooda correct kidayathu puriyutha irunga ungaluku vanthu cyber crime la than poduren na appothan ungaluku ellar team velila varuvinga cyber crime na athu vera mam oru rupai business kodukrathuku yogitha kidayathu ivlo pesuringale neenga idhu cyber crime illama enna enna panna ve poringa neenga sollunga idhu kooda avlothan fraud ellame ippidithan phone na drivingla irukren thavillama un time la call panringa uyira vangurathuku oru communication correct kidayathu ungaluku ella time la phone ok ungalukku voice phone drivingla irukka தயவு செய்து உயிர வாங்காத அடுத்த உங்களுக்கு இங்கே ரோட்ல
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with the executive's communication.

- Feels pressured to buy a 3-year package.

- Claims no business generated after buying package.

- Alleges inappropriate sales tactics.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's concerns.

- Executive asked if the executive spoke inappropriately.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, communication, business, package, cyber crime
